attributes.action: stand up for himself and this country when dealing with foreign countries and policy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please stop being led by the overly-capatalist American government and the overly-beurocratic hypocritical European Union. Examples would be Iraq, fishing, pollution...these failing manifest themselves into different rules for each country depending on how much they complain. This fails the citizens you are paid to serve.
